extendedInfo.description: Flick Golf is back and FREE TO PLAY, featuring stunning new graphics, faster gameplay and more competition. Simply more addictive than ever!#1 Sports Game in over 100 Countries! Flick Golf is unique and so challenging it's hard to put down. The question is, can you master it?No clubs. No rules. Just flick, spin and curve your shots to try and sink that perfect hole in one. Watch out for the usual hazards; bunkers, trees, sand, water... and of course the wind!TAKE THE CHALLENGEFlick Golf is just the most fun youâll have on any fairway! Weâve added our trademark spin control, created the most beautiful hole-in-one courses around and what you have is the most addictive golf game ever!STUNNING GRAPHICSâ¢ Latest 3D graphics technologyâ¢ Cutting-edge lightingâ¢ Incredible detailâ¢ Truly beautiful golf coursesFEATURESâ¢ Fast, competitive gameplayâ¢ Shoot the perfect score in Quickshotâ¢ Play World Tour from West Coast USA to Japanâ¢ Take the ultimate challenge in Legends modeâ¢ Varying wind from a light breeze to gale forceâ¢ Incredibly accurate in-flight spin controlâ¢ Friend leader boardsâ¢ Play the same game on any device!â¢ High resolution graphicsCONTACTHELP: www.fullfat.com/support VISIT: www.fullfat.comSOCIAL+1: gplus.to/fullfatgames LIKE: facebook.com/fullfatgames FOLLOW: twitter.com/fullfatgames WATCH: youtube.com/fullfatgames

reviews.title: fun game
reviews.comment: great job on this game nice graphics the games a lot of fun and addictive. this game pretty much anyone can play it and have a bunch of fun.
reviews.author: D. Geo

reviews.comment: Good game, the addition of charactersmwould be nice, alsochoice of shot distance and type of clubs would be nice, but overall its well developed, and has stunning graphics, cant wait for your next version
reviews.author: thomas walsh

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Good games good graphics easy to play all around good game!
reviews.author: William Mckemey

reviews.title: Excellent Game!!!
reviews.comment: This is an excellent game. Can\'t stop playing. I hope they put out more free flick games. For me the flick games are the best. Give this game 5 Stars all day long.
reviews.author: Matt Higginbotham

reviews.title: Brilliant game
reviews.comment: This is a super game, with great graphics and playability.  I love it and recomnend it to anyone even if you dont like golf
reviews.author: Neil Sharland

reviews.title: Lots of fun
reviews.comment: Great game lots of fun. Just finding it to easy and needs more maps .
reviews.author: scott douglas

reviews.title: Cool game
reviews.comment: But why do I need energy?  Why can\'t I just play? Do away with the stupid energy requirements please.
reviews.author: Jim Taylor

reviews.title: A great golf game
reviews.comment: Really interesting and exciting at all levels.  Enjoyable with good audio.. Malcolm Pereira
reviews.author: Malcolm Pereira

reviews.title: Love that golf
reviews.comment: Easy to learn. Fun to play. Graphics are top notch.
reviews.author: Mark Dillon

reviews.title: Good app for quick play
reviews.comment: Great control and simple to play. Great for a quick round or two.
reviews.author: Michael Howard

reviews.comment: Fun n addicting let\'s u keep playing til u earn enough points to advance :-). Love it\tFun and addicting. Let\'s u keep playing til you earn the points yo u need to go to next level :-). Love it!!!
reviews.author: Deanka Larsen

reviews.title: Great addiction and safe
reviews.comment: So much fun even your kids can enjoy it yeeaahhhh okkaaayyy i am so addicted. I could probably use a lil rehab!!!!! Try this game for sure.
reviews.author: Kevin Kenny

reviews.comment: Golden tee... for ur fone!.. awsome just wish u can play it with more strokes instead of having to het it in the hole with one flick...\tMore strokes! To get it in the hole....-that\'s what she said
reviews.author: EL MISA

reviews.title: Wow game
reviews.comment: This game is brilliant with amazing graphics getting a hole in 1 or perfect shot on world tour is the best. Well worth your time.
reviews.author: Charlie Bail

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Decent enough game. A bit frustrating at times but challenging enough to keep going.
reviews.author: Graham Barron

reviews.title: Very good game
reviews.comment: It is a very very very good game. Nice time pass one. And mainly we don\'t need to wait long time to get the free chances.
reviews.author: ranghanath narukulla

reviews.title: fun game
reviews.comment: Just needs to allow you to play longer. Having to stop for 6 mins after every few courses is not great
reviews.author: Darren Taylor

reviews.title: Pretty fun
reviews.comment: Good game. Nice graphics. My only complaint is it\'s either too easy or too hard. worth playing though.
reviews.author: Zak H.

reviews.title: Still great game. Want more holes though.
reviews.comment: Got me to pay for the same game twice as its improved enough over the first version but really hoping to see more holes rather than just updated graphics and some updated play.
reviews.author: Jeffrey Wal

reviews.title: Flick golf
reviews.comment: I wish I didn\'t have to wait for power ups to play. Just when I get going good it makes me stop :(
reviews.author: Valonda Moscini
